item.title: Inq/Sorc Rework/Buff/Nerf Thingy
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Htm:

Or you could just check if he is a magic user

And if it’s negative, it’s probably a cloak, or if it’s possitive, it’s probably a magic dust… so long as those abilities exist checking magic users is a silly exercise of futility.

Plus time is a bit of the essence.
N1. Stab find immune
N2. Check for magic (pray your result wasn’t tampered with).

N3.If non-MU, blind stab or check someone else
N3. if MU- stab again.

Htm:

I mean why would they protect you anyway? They don’t have to protect you.

Well normally I would say if sorc isn’t dead BD would want him around… but at the time I kind of forgot that magic cloak and dust are still in… Meaning the BD wouldn’t actually want to rely on this inq…

item.title: Inq/Sorc Rework/Buff/Nerf Thingy
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
I still find the entire concept of the sorc’s day abilities… as just ridiculous. even 1 use of full court frame… basically negates the entire find magic skill.

Currently inq is OP in the sense that there’s a 80% chance the BD will do his job for him early on… he’s UP in the sense that 99% of the time, he’s completely incompetent at his job.

Personally I think if the inq is to stay in the game… the sorc needs added buffs to hide from BD, and a total removal of his “make sure the inq’s abilities are too unreliable to even consider” abilities. This doesn’t seem to help much with what I consider the core problem.

IMO the inq either needs to be hands down better than the BD at finding the sorc… or he needs to be removed because he is currently best suited to sitting on his ass doing nothing while the BD does his job for him.

item.title: Inq/Sorc Rework/Buff/Nerf Thingy
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Sorcerer, Neutral, Killer

Passive 1: Mage Armour - Immune to death at night, occupation, target changing, poison and bleeding, and you will be immune to the Inquisitor’s first attack.

Passive 2: Perception - You will not attack targets that are death immune, guarded by the Knight, healed by a Physician, or are an Unseen/Cult member.

Day Ability 1: Magic Dust - All players appear to be a magic user to The Inquisitor tonight. 2 use.

Day Ability 2: Magic Cloak - All magic users will appear to be non magic users including yourself. 2 use.

Night Ability 1: Magic Missile - Fire a magic missile at a player, killing them. You’re visit will not be seen while using this. Unlimited.

Night Ability 2: Circle of Death - Everyone visiting target player will die. (Unavailable before Night 3). 3 use

Goal - Survive to see the BD fall

Inquisitor, Neutral, Investigative

Passive 1: Holy Blessing - Immune to death at night once

Passive 2: Nobody Expects The Spanish Inquisition - Your visits will be hidden from others at night.

Day Ability 1: Enhancement - Make yourself immune to occupation/target change tonight, 1 use

Day Ability 2: Blessed Eye - Watch a player at night, if the Sorcerer visits him you will be informed of the Sorcerer’s Identity, 2 use (Can only be used after night 3)

Night Ability 1: Find Magic - Check if a player is a magic user. The Court Wizard, Paladin, Mystic, Illusionist, Sage, Sorcerer, and the Cult are all magic users. Unlimited uses

Night Ability 2: Attack a player. Bypasses The Sorcerer’s death immunity the second time used on Sorcerer. 4 use

Goal - Survive to see Sorcerer fall

Feedback/suggestions are really appreciated

Also please tell me if it’s OP
